mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM (SELECT car_id, MAX(end_time) AS end_time FROM car_ins_item WHERE etp_id=#{etpId} AND del_flag=0 GROUP BY car_id) a LEFT JOIN car_info car ON a.car_id =car.`id` WHERE car.`del_flag`=0 AND a.end_time <=#{date};
SELECT id FROM car_ins_item WHERE del_flag=0 AND etp_id=#{etpId}
SELECT i.*, c.`lic_code` as licCode, u.nick_name as username FROM car_ins_item i LEFT JOIN car_info c ON i.`car_id` = c.`id` left join sys_user u on i.user_id=u.user_id WHERE i.`id` =#{id}
SELECT i.*, c.`lic_code` as licCode FROM car_ins_item i LEFT JOIN car_info c ON i.`car_id` = c.`id` WHERE i.`user_id` =#{userId} and i.item_status=0
